item.title: Omeka-S in Docksal
item.description: Attention! The Docksal portion of this discussion DID NOT WORK PROPERLY so I’ve hidden it from public view. Don’t use this project with Docksal (fin commands) until further notice!

item.title: Building Grocy in Docksal
item.description: Grocy looks lika a great little PHP stack application for me. It’s aim is to help folks organize and inventory their “stuff”, with a slant toward food and groceries. I need this! Since I’m also a big fan of Docker and Docksal, naturally I wanted to spin Grocy up in one of these environments. Thankfully, the heavy lifting of getting this “Dockerized” has already been done, and that fine work is shared in GitHub at grocy/grocy-docker. So my quest last evening started with a fork of this GitHub project to SummittDweller/grocy-docker, where I’ve created a new docksal branch.
